Uses of Class
hudson.model.Job

Packages that use Job
hudson.model Core object model that are bound to URLs via stapler, rooted at Hudson. 
hudson.tasks Built-in Builders and Publishers that perform the actual heavy-lifting of a build. 
hudson.util Other miscellaneous utility code 
 

Uses of Job in hudson.model
 

Classes in hudson.model with type parameters of type Job
 class Job<JobT extends Job<JobT,RunT>,RunT extends Run<JobT,RunT>>
          A job is an runnable entity under the monitoring of Hudson.
 class JobDescriptor<J extends Job<J,R>,R extends Run<J,R>>
          Descriptor for Jobs.
 class Run<JobT extends Job<JobT,RunT>,RunT extends Run<JobT,RunT>>
          A particular execution of Job.
 

Subclasses of Job in hudson.model
 class ExternalJob
          Job that runs outside Hudson whose result is submitted to Hudson (either via web interface, or simply by placing files on the file system, for compatibility.)
 class Project
          Buildable software project.
 class ViewJob<JobT extends ViewJob<JobT,RunT>,RunT extends Run<JobT,RunT>>
          Job that monitors activities that happen outside Hudson, which requires occasional batch reload activity to obtain the up-to-date information.
